text: @DiegoCarranza_ @Bitcoin @ethereum Already made several improvements on this: MEV-Geth moved the auction for MEV from onchain (which clogged up blockspace) to off chain. MEV-boost allows any validator to receive MEV blocks (vs. just whitelisted ones in POW). We plan to remove the dependency on all of this too!
